Package entities

Class DatabaseConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.DatabaseConnector
  • public class DatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    The DatabaseConnector class is responsible for connecting to the database, parsing data, and managing the connection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String connect()
      connecting to the database with the correct information that given from the server screen.
      boolean disconnect()
      Disconnects from the database.
      java.sql.Connection getConnection()
      Returns the database connection.
      static DatabaseConnector getDatabaseConnectorInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the DatabaseConnector class.
      static void parsingToData​(MissionPack obj, ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
      Parses the given MissionPack object and invokes the server's mission analysis method.
      void setConnectionDetailsList​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> detailsList)
      Sets the connection details list.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getDatabaseConnectorInstance

        public static DatabaseConnector getDatabaseConnectorInstance()
        Returns the singleton instance of the DatabaseConnector class.
        Returns:
        The DatabaseConnector instance

      • getConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getConnection()
        Returns the database connection. If the connection is not established, it configures the driver and connects to the database.
        Returns:
        The database connection

      • parsingToData

        public static void parsingToData​(MissionPack obj,
                                 ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient client)
        Parses the given MissionPack object and invokes the server's mission analysis method.
        Parameters:
        obj - The MissionPack object to parse
        client - The ConnectionToClient object representing the client

      • connect

        public java.lang.String connect()
        connecting to the database with the correct information that given from the server screen. if the information is incorrect, it will throw SQLException.
        Returns:
        string depending on the information

      • setConnectionDetailsList

        public void setConnectionDetailsList​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> detailsList)
        Sets the connection details list.
        Parameters:
        detailsList - The list of connection details

      • disconnect

        public boolean disconnect()
        Disconnects from the database.
        Returns:
        True if the disconnection is successful, false otherwise
